Title: Establishes an integrated energy system
Summary: Establishes an integrated energy system plan that coordinates and optimizes the energy needs of combination corporation customers between electric supply, electric transmission, electric distribution, distributed energy, and demand-side resources and gas transmission and distribution to provide reliable, resilient, clean energy to combination corporation customers at the lowest reasonable cost and risk; defines terms; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง66-x, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to creating an integrated energy system planning
